alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:32AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph, with gusts up to 70 mph, are expected. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Fergus County below 4500ft, Hill County, Northern Blaine County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County
